name: Marelize Riëtte van Tonder
label: Data Analyst
summary: I have a deep love for mathematics that naturally led me to pursue data science as a field of study. With a degree in Mathematics, I have a strong analytical foundation and a passion for solving complex problems through data. I have technical proficiency in tools such as Python, SQL, and data visualization platforms like Power BI. I am curious, detail-oriented, and thrive in collaborative environments where data is central to decision-making.

work_experience.summary: Help to get things ready for classes, assist teachers with preperations and marking.
highlights: Give mathematics and science classes to grade 12 learners as well as afterschool classes
Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Modeling, Data Transformation
Python (Programming Language), Data Cleaning, Exploratory Data Analysis, SQL, Hypothesis Testing, Git, Data Manipulation, Seaborn, Matplotlib, Pandas, Problem Solving
SQL, Data Visualization, PostgreSQL, Problem Solving
Python (Programming Language), Seaborn, Pandas, Problem Solving
Python (Programming Language), Seaborn, Pandas, Scikit-Learn, Matplotib, Problem Solving

projects.title: Pizza Sales Analysis
projects.summary: The goal of this analysis is to uncover business insights and understand customer preferences based on historical pizza sales data. By examining patterns and trends within the dataset, we aim to inform future decision-making in areas such as inventory planning, menu optimization, and marketing strategies.
highlights: The overview dashboard shows the KPI's of the business as well as a emphasis on the best and worst performing months and times.
The performance dashboard shows the 5 best and worst performing pizzas by revenue, quantity and total orders.

degrees: Master of Science in Computer Science

interests.name: Indoor plants
interests.summary: I enjoy caring for indoor plants and creating calming, natural spaces in the home. This passion led me to start my own home business selling plants and plant accessories.

interests.name: Nature Photography
interests.summary: One of my favorite hobbies is nature photography, especially macro photography, which opens up a hidden world of intricate details and beauty often missed by the naked eye.
